story_04_04000/2401_1001_0200_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], meet Erika.
Erika, meet... Erika...? Are you asleep?
story_04_04000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Oh... Oh dear!
I drifted off again, didn’t I.
story_04_04000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Brock? Is that you? What a pleasant surprise.
And...who might this be?
story_04_04000/2401_1001_0500_10:
This is [Name:PlayerNickname ]. We formed a
team together to compete in the PML.
story_04_04000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Really? Well, isn’t that delightful.
I suppose you came for a badge, then?
story_04_04000/2401_1001_0700_10:
You guessed it. Uh, what exactly do we
have to do to get our hands on one of
these badges, anyway?
story_04_04000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Well, first things first—we go head-to-head
in a Pokémon battle.
story_04_04000/2401_0302_1100_10: Are you sure you aren’t too tired?
story_04_04000/2401_0402_1200_10:
Tee-hee! That’s very kind of you,
but I assure you, I’m quite prepared.
story_04_04000/2401_1001_1300_10: I’m not going to go easy on you!
